featured.text: It is not easy for old people to _____ their backs, so they need help when their backs itch.
They use a range of terms to describe it—stuck-song syndrome, sticky music, cognitive itch, or most commonly “earworm.”

definition.zh_def: 癢，皮膚感到不適的感覺，通常會引起抓撓的衝動。
definition.en_def: A sensation on the skin that causes a desire to scratch.
definition.example: I have an itch on my arm that I can't seem to reach.
